# SidebarItemRoom
<Story name='States'>
  <PropsVariationSection
    component={SidebarItemRoom}
    common={{ style: {width: '250px'}, title: 'John\'s room', lastMessage: {username: 'John', text: 'I\'m not John', time:'21:03'}, avatar: {url: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'}}}
    xAxis={{
      private: { roomType: 'p' },
      public: { roomType: 'c' },
      direct: { roomType: 'd', status: 'online' },
    }}
    yAxis={{
      extended: { viewMode: 'extended' },
      'extended + unread': { viewMode: 'extended', unreadCount:{count: 25, hasMention: false}},
      'extended + unread + mention': { viewMode: 'extended', unreadCount:{count: 25, hasMention: true}},
      medium: { viewMode: 'medium' },
      'medium + unread': { viewMode: 'medium', unreadCount:{count: 25, hasMention: false}},
      condensed: { viewMode: 'condensed' },
      'condensed + unread + mention': { viewMode: 'condensed', unreadCount:{count: 25, hasMention: true}},
    }}
  />
</Story>
